title: [CLIENT]
body: I opened my client for LoL and it updated then launched. Afterward the LoL client went full black. Why cant I play LoL anymore? :(

replies.body:
Hey Plexqus,

You may wanna try Riots crash Kb. I have had issues like this before and it fixed me right up. 

Crash KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes 

I'll be on for a bit so if you're still having issues reach out to me! 


{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
